com.gocardless.http

Class PutRequest<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gocardless.http.PutRequest<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the item returned by this request.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CreditorService.CreditorUpdateRequest, CustomerBankAccountService.CustomerBankAccountUpdateRequest, CustomerService.CustomerUpdateRequest, MandateService.MandateUpdateRequest, PaymentService.PaymentUpdateRequest, RefundService.RefundUpdateRequest, SubscriptionService.SubscriptionUpdateRequest

    public abstract class PutRequest<T>
extends java.lang.Object

    Base class for PUT requests.
